body:
Here's the issues with the latest revision:

1. If I open the recipe edit page, make a change, and save a new draft, the approval button disappears entirely. The URL looks like it's a revision-specific page instead of the general recipe editing page. I expected to stay on the recipe edit page when saving new drafts.

2. If I save a new recipe, request approval, and approve it, I see an "Enable" and "Save Draft" button. If I then save a new draft, I no longer hit a loading indicator, but get redirected to the revision page as in issue 1. If I go back to the recipe edit page, it shows me the approved revision and not the new drafts. If I then enable the recipe, it appears that those drafts are gone.

3. If I try to save a new draft for an enabled recipe, the recipe edit view will only show me the approved version and not the new drafts. If I then disable the recipe, my edits show up again.

body_html:
Here's the issues with the latest revision:

  1. If I open the recipe edit page, make a change, and save a new draft, the approval button disappears entirely. The URL looks like it's a revision-specific page instead of the general recipe editing page. I expected to stay on the recipe edit page when saving new drafts.

  2. If I save a new recipe, request approval, and approve it, I see an "Enable" and "Save Draft" button. If I then save a new draft, I no longer hit a loading indicator, but get redirected to the revision page as in issue 1. If I go back to the recipe edit page, it shows me the approved revision and not the new drafts. If I then enable the recipe, it appears that those drafts are gone.

  3. If I try to save a new draft for an enabled recipe, the recipe edit view will only show me the approved version and not the new drafts. If I then disable the recipe, my edits show up again.
